name: 9 Lives to Die
description:
This was made by a team of 2 for the GMTK2022 Game Jam. All assets (with exception of some light boilerplate code) were created for this project during the 48 hour timeframe.

9 Lives to Die is a small action platformer with rogue-lite elements. You'll need to roll the dice (the theme of the jam) to obtain abilities that will assist you through the dungeon. Making use of your trusty sword, run and jump your way through the gloomy caverns.

Code by Keywarn, art by Ipidoo.

(Web build may have some issues. If you run into any errors, please try the standalone downloads available below)
